{{Lang|'''Hitotsume Kozou'''|ja=一つ目小僧|ja_rm=Hitotsume-kozou}} is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who first appeared in ''[[Akitsu Kimodameshi]]''. He is a [[youkai]] who is close friends with [[Youko]] and [[Kappa]].

===Appearance===
Hitotsume Kozou takes the form of a young boy with pale skin and short black hair. He appears to have a single large eye in the middle of his face and a mischievous smile, and wears a navy shirt and pants with sandals and an oversized straw hat.
